bill_title: require approval of certain federal grants.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require approval of certain federal grants. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 4-8 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Notwithstanding § 4-8-17, no multiyear or continuation grant award from the federal government may be amended or reinstated without review by the special committee created by chapter 4-8A and then only with the affirmative vote on acceptance of the funds by a majority of the full membership of the special committee. Section 2. That chapter 4-8 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: For the purposes of this Act, the term, multiyear or continuation grant award, means a grant award which lasts more than twelve months. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
